ygData.subject: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Are the non-jewelery quest components for the bard armor quests new items that have been added to the game or have they been around for a while?  I have never
ygData.messageBody:
Are the non-jewelery quest components for the bard armor quests new items
that have been added to the game or have they been around for a while? I
have never seen or heard anyone auctioning any of the items before (granted
I'm not high enough level to go to the places they are found).

As a 25th level bard, the only way I will be able to gather most of these
quest components anytime in the near future is to buy them. I will have to
gain a few more levels before I can adventure in the places to loot them
myself. It also appears that, with the exception of lambent stones, bards
are the only class that need these items for their armor quests. If this is
true, then the market for buying these quest components should be fairly
small. The key will be if the quest components are NO DROP. Does anyone
know if any of these quest components are NO DROP or can they be sold?

Galtin of E'ci
